text: Giorgos Xydas (, born 14 April 1997) is a Greek professional footballer who plays as a forward for Super League club PAS Giannina. == Club career == Xydas completed a transfer to PAS Giannina on 3 July 2018 by signing a three-year contract. ==References== Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Olympiacos F.C. players Category:PAS Giannina F.C. players Category:Association football forwards Category:Greek footballers Category:AEL Kalloni F.C. players Category:AO Chania F.C. players Category:Greece youth international footballers Category:People from Chios
title: Giorgos Xydas
